original_text: Jesus was still speaking when, immediately, Judas arrived. He was one of Jesus' 12 apostles. A crowd came with him. They were carrying swords and heavy sticks. The leaders of the priests, the teachers of God's Law and the important Jews had sent these men.
korean_text: 예수께서 말씀하실 때에 곧 열둘 중의 하나인 유다가 왔는데 대제사장들과 서기관들과 장로들에게서 파송된 무리가 검과 몽치를 가지고 그와 함께 하였더라

sentences.original_text: He was one of Jesus' 12 apostles
They were carrying swords and heavy sticks
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 칼과 무거운 막대기를 들고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and the important Jews had sent these men
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 유대인 지도자들이 이 사람들을 보냈다
